name: Availette
tagline: Simple HTML5 Jquery plugin availability calendar (with Google calendar integration)
body:
### Availette
Availette is a simple HTML5 / JQuery plugin for displaying your availability in a calendar, using a public google calendar URL from which to take your (in)availability. Availette is perfect for freelancers and small businesses to show when they are available.

### Usage
For the most basic usage, include [moment.js](http://momentjs.com/), availette.js and availette.css in your HTML. You may also require both momentJS and Availette as AMD modules, e.g. with requireJS.

To add the Availette calendar to the page, create a placeholder div for the calendar then give it to Availette as a target like so:

```
opts = {googleCalendarUrl: 'http://'};
$('#targetdiv').availette(opts);
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
